description: Manage DNS resolver policy virtual network links.

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link create
commands.summary: Create a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy vnet-link create --dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name
                                        --policy-name
                                        --resource-group
                                        --virtual-network
                                        [--if-match]
                                        [--if-none-match]
                                        [--location]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link create --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name sampleVirtualNetworkLink --location westus2 --tags "{key1:value1}" --virtual-network "{id:/subscriptions/0403cfa9-9659-4f33-9f30-1f191c51d111/resourceGroups/sampleVnetResourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/sampleVirtualNetwork}"

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link delete
commands.summary: Delete a DNS resolver policy virtual network link. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy vnet-link delete [--dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--if-match]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--policy-name]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--yes]
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-resolver-policy-link delete --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name sampleVirtualNetworkLink

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link list
commands.summary: List DNS resolver policy virtual network links.
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-resolver-policy-link list --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link show
commands.summary: Get properties of a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-resolver-policy-link show --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name sampleVirtualNetworkLink

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link update
commands.summary: Update a DNS resolver policy virtual network link.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy vnet-link update [--add]
                                        [--dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name]
                                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--if-match]
                                        [--if-none-match]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--policy-name]
                                        [--remove]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--set]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link update --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-resolver-policy-virtual-network-link-name sampleVirtualNetworkLink --location westus2 --tags "{key2:value2}"

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy vnet-link wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
